metadata.title: Wednesday, 13th November, 2024
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) when electrification of Kabinga Chiefdom in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency, by the Rural Electrification Authority, will commence;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is;
(c) what the cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development when the Government will employ experts in rural district councils to enhance the execution of projects under the Constituency Development Fund.
Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to empower youths who are involved in the following economic sectors in Muchinga Parliamentary Constituency:
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
